Commands executed:
- PYTHONPATH=.. python3 -m lillycore.run_runtime | tee docs/build/outputs/p1.1.6/normal_shutdown.txt
- FORCE_SHUTDOWN_ERROR=1 PYTHONPATH=.. python3 -m lillycore.run_runtime | tee docs/build/outputs/p1.1.6/negative_shutdown.txt

Stop command used:
- stop

Notes:
- Negative-path run forces an exception during shutdown (on_stop); runtime envelopes and logs it.
